thread.title: Cameraman zooms in on brunette model’s BUM during family TV show… and viewers can’t get enough of the saucy footage

author: sroberts
title: Cameraman zooms in on brunette model’s BUM during family TV show… and viewers can’t get enough of the saucy footage
text:
Mrs Crunch TIME FOR YOUR CLOSE UP Cameraman zooms in on brunette model’s BUM during family TV show… and viewers can’t get enough of the saucy footage 
It's not surprising why this saucy clip has gone viral Video By SOPHIE ROBERTS 20th February 2017, 12:48 pm VIEWERS of this ‘family TV show’ must’ve been left feeling flustered after this cheeky segment was broadcast live on air. 
An excited cameraman couldn’t resist giving everyone a VERY revealing close up of a curvy model’s bum during the programme. REDE TV/SuperPop The show seemed to feature a pageant segment, which saw this lovely lady parade around in underwear 
Brazilian chat show Superpop got everyone talking when it featured the moment on a recent segment. 
As the scantily-clad model strut her stuff on the show, the cameraman gave viewers a very eye-popping view. 
While the Brazilian bombshell showed off a set of tartan-printed underwear, she turned her back to the camera before leaving the set. REDE TV/SuperPop As the model walked off stage, viewers caught a glimpse of her bottom REDE TV/SuperPop 4 But the cameraman clearly wanted to give even MORE appreciation to her curvy rear 
Clearly a fan of the rear view, the person behind the camera focused in entirely on the model’s peachy behind. 
Since the racy clip from Superpop was uploaded online, it’s racked up a whopping 130,000 views. 
The saucy snippet has been captioned: “This cameraman has no shame when he sees what he likes.” REDE TV/SuperPop Naughty viewers have been lapping up the raunchy segment since it was posted online 
Viewers couldn’t help but admire the stunning woman in the clip. 
One said: “DANG that chick was f ne! 
“Camera man should have followed her and zoomed in a little more.” 
Another agreed: “It’s a pageant bikini contest, what do you think they want you to look at?” 
Despite the appreciation for the model’s enviable figure, many may wonder why the cheeky close-up was aired on the show. 
Superpop’s website claims that it’s a programme for the “entire family” that is “filled with good humour, controversy and curiosities”. Related Stories Kim Kardashian shares wet T-shirt throwback pics and contemplates Paris Fashion Week return Rear viewing Jenson Button's stunning girlfriend Brittny Ward poses NAKED in just her stiletto heels VALENTINE'S FOR LEGENDS! Topless Chrissy Teigen strips to fishnets for sexy Valentine's Day video NUDE-TURN! Playboy brings back NUDE photos after Hugh Hefner's son says banning the sexy snaps was a bad idea NAKED FURY Thai Playboy models devastated to find their sexy pics used on PORN DVD covers 
It’s not the first time a guest on Brazilian television has left viewers feeling hot under the collar. 
A sizzling weather girl caused a storm on TV when she experienced an unfortunate wardrobe malfunction. 
Sugey Abrego made viewers blush when she gave away more than intended in a skin-tight pink top and denim hotpants.
